body_html: If you’re saying that you have no use for changing the sampler parameters between epochs, then what is this PR about? The way I see it is that you’re making reset overfit whatever samplers are there today, and unnecessarily limiting the public API.
body_text: If you’re saying that you have no use for changing the sampler parameters between epochs, then what is this PR about? The way I see it is that you’re making reset overfit whatever samplers are there today, and unnecessarily limiting the public API.
body: If you’re saying that you have no use for changing the sampler parameters between epochs, then what is this PR about? The way I see it is that you’re making reset overfit whatever samplers are there today, and unnecessarily limiting the public API.
